name: Uncle Panko's Terrible Little Farm
description:
Your eccentric Uncle Panko has invited you to spend the summer at his farm!

Explore the surrounding forest and farmland, take care of the livestock, and follow your uncle’s weird rules to have a great summer vacation! 

Or don’t.

CONTROLS
  • WASD: Move
  • Mouse: Camera 
  • Left Shift: Run 
  • E: Interact/Use Item
  • Left Mouse Button: Use Sickle
